review_text: I thought this movie dragged on a little longer than it needed to and that is the only bad thing I have to say about it. Old fashioned is something that this world needs more of, sadly because people are quick to jump in and out of relationships, we lose the value of a committed relationship. If you are a hopeless romantic, you will be pleasantly surprised. ladies, bring the tissues, you will need it.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
